page.title: 07CHILD HEALTH, KNOTTINGLEY
page.content: We asked 130 children in the 8 year old range, questions about themselves. These are the results. BOYS GIRLS Average weight = 25.25kg 24.76kg Average height = 127.4 cm 119.9 cm Earrings were worn by 9 36 Chdn. with fillings in their teeth = 39 35 The smallest shoe size was 10, the largest 3.5. The size worn most was 1. Spectacles were worn by 15%. Operations - Appendectomy 1 Tonsillectomy 14 Number in family. 8 in family- 2chdn. 7 in family-7chdn. 6 in family-13chdn. 5 in family-32chdn 4 in family-57chdn. 3 in family-14chdn 2 in family- 4chdn.
